Title: Saki Achiga-hen: Episode of Side-A Specials
Description:
["The semifinal round of the Inter-High Mahjong Championship is still in full swing. After witnessing the extraordinary might of the champion Teru Miyanaga of Shiraitodai High School, the girls of Achiga High School are left bewildered. However, even if the odds are against them, it's not too late yetâ€”the game has just begun.", '
